name: Spiral CT Scan
about: A procedure that uses a computer linked to an x-ray machine to make a series of detailed pictures of areas inside the body.Spiral CT uses a faster machine that spins continuously around the body. This allows it to more quickly detect images and spot problems. It can also detect small nodules (early-stage lung disease) that cannot be clearly seen on chest x-rays.

name: Kathak
about: Kathak performances include Urdu Ghazals and commonly used instruments brought during the Mughal period.

name: Bihu
about: The Bihu dance is an indigenous folk dance from the Indian state of Assam.

name: Contemporary
about: Contemporary dancers strive to connect the mind and the body through fluid dance movements.

name: Ballet
about: Ballet is a type of performance dance that originated during the Italian Renaissance.

name: Bharatanatyam
about: Bharatanatyam is a major form of Indian classical dance that originated in Tamil Nadu.

name: Folk
about: Among the most widespread of Folk dances are the dhali, baul, manipuri.

name: Hip-hop
about: Hip-hop dance is a fusion dance genre.
